metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6842 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ColorChanger::GetColorFromStack function in colorchanger.cpp in PoDoFo0.9.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6842` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpodofo-utils - 0.9.0-1.2ubuntu0.1~esm1
libpodofo0.9.0 - 0.9.0-1.2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.0-1.2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
